project.name: Serbo-Croatian/Bosnian Locale Service Provider
project.description:
A Java extension JAR providing (partial) definitions for Bosnian and Serbo-Croatian (latin) locales. Includes date and time formats, number formats, collation and others.
Requires Java 6 or higher. See http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/ext/basics/index.html and the Javadoc of java.util.spi.LocaleServiceProvider for information on usage and deployment.
